name: crabbing
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the activity of trying to catch crabs (= sea creatures with five pairs of legs and a round, flat body covered by a shell), either as a job or for pleasure: He has been making a living from crabbing for 24 years. We showed her where we used to go crabbing as children.
More examplesFewer examplesFishing or crabbing near the island is banned.Local tourist shops sell nets for crabbing.Crabbing was the most popular sport and bait and nets were for sale everywhere.Environmentalists and commercial fishermen often disagree on fishing and crabbing limits, but they agree on the need for clean water.
